<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's it. If you collect items like
this, you'll be able to use them in a
variety of ways.
<PAGE>
Even stuff that doesn't look like you'll
have any use for, it might be worth
picking up for later. You never know.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There are all sorts of <RED>tools</RED> you'll have
to use in order to collect construction
materials.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've got a few tools here that you might
need to use. Please, take them!

<SPEED_IMME>                               
　　　　You got the <GREEN>hammer</GREEN>!

<SPEED_IMME>                               
　　　　You got the <GREEN>hammer blueprints</GREEN>!

<SPEED_IMME>                               
　　　　You got the <GREEN>axe</GREEN>!

<SPEED_IMME>                               
　　　　You got the <GREEN>axe blueprints</GREEN>!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I'll explain blueprints to you later.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next, allow me to explain about the
<RED>bag</RED> that you'll be using to manage items
you pick up.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, do you already know how to use
the <RED>bag</RED>?
I don't know
I already know

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, fine. Let me explain.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Select the bag from the <BLUE>X Button</BLUE>
<RED>menu</RED>. Here's the screen you will see
after making the selection.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, fine. That's one less thing I need
to tell you about.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I need to tell you about how to <RED>read</RED>
<RED>blueprints</RED>. You don't know how to build
houses, but can you <RED>read blueprints</RED>?

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Let me tell you, then. I'll start by
giving you the materials you need and
the <GREEN>house blueprints</GREEN>.

<SPEED_IMME>                               
　 You got the materials needed to build
your house!

<SPEED_IMME>                               
　 You got the <GREEN>house blueprints</GREEN>.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
If you want to build or move placed
items around select <RED>Edit</RED> from the
<BLUE>X Button</BLUE> menu.
<PAGE>
I'll explain Edit to you first. Take a
look at this.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
If you know how to read a blueprint then
building a house is simple. Let's give
it a try now, shall we?
<PAGE>
Here are the materials you'll need to
build a house for yourself, and the
blueprints for it. Take them!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Don't over think it. Try, try again!

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now I'll explain about what you can do
inside your house. Come inside with me.

<FACE_DUNHILL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's all I need to explain about the
bag. Now I'll explain what you can do
inside your house. Come inside with me.
